channel.title: Keras on In Code We Trust
channel.description: Recent content in Keras on In Code We Trust

item.title: To Eat, or not to Eat, that is the Question
item.description: Mycology is the branch of biology concerned with the study of fungi, including their genetic and biochemical properties, their taxonomy and their use to humans as a source for tinder, medicine, food, and entheogens, as well as their dangers, such as toxicity or infection. It’s complicated and fascinating at the same time. I wasn’t particularly fond of it at the university. On the other hand I really enjoy eating mushroom. I normally buy them at the local market, so safety is no real concern of mine.
